response.overview: So-ra and her friend Woo-yeol call So-ra to a motel to get over the hardship after breaking up with her girlfriend and have a drink. While talking about their breakup, they get drunk on each other and unintentionally begin to be attracted to each other. So-ra and Nara, who fall asleep while drinking, go out on a date to meet her boyfriend Ji-sung, and the two head to a motel. But Nara's unprepared bed for her becomes worried about her, and she calls Sora to explain her situation and make her worry about what to do.
response.title: Save me! One Night
